quote: Jordan's superpower is translating difficult, complex topics with a wide variety of opinionated stakeholders. She turned our Sonatype Guide prototypes and user flows into a live web application that our engineering team could reference as they began their work. Additionally, she actively supported her teams and made regular contributions to the codebase, addressing minor UX issues to maintain the team's flow state.
author: Meredith E.

quote: Jordan is one of the most diligent designers that I've worked with throughout my career. Whenever she is given a task, she digs in, seeking to genuinely understand the use case at hand so that she can create the clearest and most effective user experience. This depth of understanding, along with her attention to detail, enabled her to solve some of our product group's most complex workflow challenges. Her eye towards consistency and appreciation of accessible web standards have helped elevate the quality of our products. Jordan is an experienced remote worker accustomed to collaborating with all levels of the organizational hierarchy, from individual contributors to C-suite executives. She is a valuable addition to any development team, and a joy to work with.
author: Ross P.

quote: Jordan doesn't just design interfacesâ€”she designs systems. Her attention to accessibility and developer experience sets a new standard for our team.
author: Emily Watson
